alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 8:36PM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Near blizzard conditions will be possible at times. * WHERE...Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties. Greatest snow accumulations will be in the far northern sections of both counties, with very little accumulation closer to the Pennsylvania border. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times with snow covered roads. Widespread blowing snow will reduce visibility to near zero in lake effect bands.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
